name: Schoolar Girls Throw Ball
description:
Simple golf-like game for up to 4 players, my first 3D game so there is much things that i would do better but im glad i decided to try 3D

Controls:

W,A,S,D for direction and camera control while throw

SPACE for throw the ball

Left Click on the girls on Select Char screen to change characters

more than 1 people can play as the same character
